Player History
Released by Penn on 10/29/1989...
Signed as a free agent by Toledo on 2/2/1990 to a 5-year deal worth $12,000,000 per year...
Had first career hit (homerun) on 4/1/1990, off Benjamin Vivo (MAN)...
Had 5 hits with 1 RBI against Minnesota on 8/7/1990...
Won Slick Fielder Award at Centerfield in 1990...
Was selected to the 1992 Allstar game...
Had 28-game hitting streak snapped on 7/23/1992...
Won World Championship with Toledo in 1992...
